channel.title: Server Status Page
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape,
The past few days i've been working on my new status page, heres a list of features;
Add Server Edit Server Sponsored Spots Regular Spots Vote Up Vote Down Uptime Status Login Logout WYSIWIG Editor
Screen shots; [img]http://ihaxx.net/toplist3.png[/img] [img]http://ihaxx.net/editserver.png[/img]
Coming Soon; Email verification YouTube video embedding Admin Panel ReCaptcha to vote + to create server Sponsored Server Images
Suggestions?
If you have any suggestions on features i could be adding then please let me know
Thanks, Elux

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Oh the google ads? I didn’t know you couldn’t link sites like that. Havn’t been around on here in a couple years now ;o

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

This is the general programming section, you can post code and such, not a link to your status page (you could post images though). If you’re not asking for or showing of something like code, it doesn’t belong here.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Not advertising. I need some features and my payment links dont even work and they wont be im going to be releasing my work.

If im breaking any rules i’ll happily remove this thread.

Read full topic
